master.healthcare101Option1Description: Learn the basics on how health plans work — from often-seen terms to frequently-used services.
master.healthcare101Option1Title: Want to polish up your health plan knowledge?
master.healthcare101Option2Description: Take a few minutes to learn about the plans that are being made available to you.
master.healthcare101Option2Title: Want an introduction to the plan(s) being offered?
master.homePageHeroOption1Description: This website is a simple way to learn about the benefits and services offered through (employer name) and (UnitedHealthcare / Oxford). We hope the information will help you as you think about your health care needs and make your benefit decisions.
master.homePageHeroOption2Description: {employerData.employerName} is offering benefits to help you prepare for every part of your life — to help you live healthier, save for the future and live life to the fullest. UnitedHealthcare created this site to offer an overview of the {homePageHero.planList} benefits and wellness services offered to you.
master.promotionalSpace1Option1Description: Learn the basics on how health plans work — from often-seen terms to frequently-used services.
master.promotionalSpace1Option1Title: Want to polish up your health plan knowledge?
master.promotionalSpace1Option2Description: Take a few minutes to learn about the plans (your employer) is making available to you.
master.promotionalSpace1Option2Title: Want an introduction to the plan(s) being offered?
master.promotionalSpace2Option1Description: You'll have access to personal services and clinical support - whether you're simply looking for information or are trying to manage a health condition.
master.promotionalSpace2Option2Description: Stay connected to your health anywhere you go with your personal website, myuhc.com®, and the UnitedHealthcare® app, your mobile home for on-the-go info.
